Wiki-20-TL

This is the TurboLucene-enhanced version of the tutorial project for TurboGears
1.0. You can view the TurboLucene tutorial by visiting:

http://dev.krys.ca/turbolucene/wiki/GettingStarted

or view the original TurboGears tutorial by visiting:

http://docs.turbogears.org/1.0/Wiki20/

This project is configured to use a sqlite database that will be created in the same directiory as this README file.

If you have problems, post on the TurboLucene mailing list:

http://lists.krys.ca/mailman/listinfo/turbolucene

Happy Hacking.
